description: Here at Goonhammer, we know that it’s hard to keep track of all the news happening all the time in the games industry. So much is always going on with games of all sorts, and their related media, it can be a real blink-and-you’ll miss it situation.  That’s why every week, we round up five […]
title: Games Industry News Roundup- June 25th, 2024

description: Is your SHIELD list missing a fishy presence? Could your Wakandans do with some mystic empowerment? Then this box might be for you! Who Is Namor? Namor the Sub-Mariner made his debut in Marvel Comics (then Timely Comics) in “Motion Picture Funnies Weekly” #1 in April 1939, and then in “Marvel Comics” #1 in October […]
title: Marvel: Crisis Protocol – Namor the Sub-Mariner and Black Panther, Chosen of Bast

description: In our How to Paint Everything series, we take a look at different armies of the Warhammer universe, examine their history and heraldry, and look at several different methods for painting them. In this article we’re looking at the Leagues of Votann. The Leagues of Votann are the newest addition to the list of Warhammer 40,000 […]
title: How To Paint Everything: The Leagues of  Votann

description: The Core Concept There’s a prevailing opinion that gold in D&D is a bit… weird. The amounts that things cost and what you can actually spend gold on vary from game to game. The core books base item costs on rarity alone hoping that rarer items are strong and more useful, which is absolutely not […]
title: Vrekais Is a New DM: Lego as Physical Currency

description: A thank you to Games Workshop for sending us the rules as part of Fire and Jade book in the Skaventide box set. The Spearhead models used in this article were not provided. With the arrival of Age of Sigmar fourth edition, Games Workshop is introducing a brand-new game mode, Spearhead, that uses the contents […]
title: Starting Your Age of Sigmar Spearhead: Sylvaneth

description: The past weekend was a warm one in the UK, where a hundred participants took cover from the sun's harsh rays to take part in the Goonhammer Open.
title: The Goonhammer Open UK June 2024 – Awards and Thank Yous
